title: Afreximbank and Ghana Settle Dispute Over $750 Million Loan
description: The African Export-Import Bank has settled a dispute with Ghana over a $750 million loan, though it didn’t disclose if it would take losses.
content: The African Export-Import Bank has settled a dispute with Ghana over a $750 million loan, though it didn’t disclose if it would take losses.
